text: @GovMurphy Bro we get you're combining all flu related illnesses in with COVID-19 numbers. We also get you're doing it to get as much federal $ as possible. But not all of us are 🐑. Just because we're not billionaires like u doesnt mean we'll keep taking your bullshit.
